ruleSearch.author: $.author
ruleSearch.bookUrl:
<js>
var bid=parseInt(java.getString('$.bookId'));

if(!bid>0){
bid=parseInt(java.getString('$.id'));
}
java.put("bid",bid);
var subpath=parseInt((1999+bid)/2000);
var url="http://statics.ywpxg.com/static/book/zip/"+subpath+"/"+bid+".zip";
//java.log(url)
result=url;</js>
ruleSearch.name: $.name
